description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Power Field, Volatile

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Power Sword of the Fire Hawks Chapter. Weapon scores a Righteous Fury on an 8, 9, or 10, however if any dice involved in the Righteous Fury rolls a 10, the blade breaks and is unusable for the rest of the mission. It can be reforged afterwards.
